Your sister, her death a stark reminder of the consequences when trust is misplaced. Tell me, did your understanding of ethics serve her well, or did it betray her? Perhaps it’s time to reflect not on just forgiveness, but on the price demanded for naivety. Sometimes, true strength lies in a darkness unacknowledged.
